Class BorderScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • BorderScheme

  • public class BorderScheme
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BorderScheme() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.swing.border.Border extraPadding()
      Returns extra "padding": extra background-colored padding all around.
      static javax.swing.border.Border horzPadding()
      Returns horizontal padding: adds extra background-colored padding to the left and right sides only.
      static javax.swing.border.Border padded()
      Returns a "padded" Border object: a dark outline with extra background-colored padding.
      static javax.swing.border.Border padding()
      Returns a "padding" Border object: extra background-colored padding with no dark outline.
      static javax.swing.border.Border standard()
      Returns a "standard" Border object: a dark outline.
      static javax.swing.border.Border target(int width, int height)
      Returns a "target" Border object: a target-colored compound border.
